itunes:title: Popcorn Thrillers
title: Popcorn Thrillers
description:
In Episode 3 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are talking about Popcorn Thrillers! They share what they're loving lately, their latest read, a shelf addition, and have book talk about Popcorn Thrillers- books that are pure entertainment, read really fast, and feel impossible to put down.Â 

Loving Lately
The Future of Remote Work is the Opposite of Lonely- Anne Helen Petersen Article
Tom Brown's Body
S Town (Mentioned)

Latest Read
6:30 You'll Never Believe What Happened to Lacey: Crazy Stories About Racism- Amber Ruffin and Lacey Lamar
8:37 Too Good to BeÂ  True- Carola Lovering

Book Talk
12:46 They All Fall Down- Rachel Howzell Hall
Murder on the Orient Express - Agatha Christie (movie mentioned)
12:08 Safe by S.K. Barnett
Derailed- James Siegel (movie mentioned)
18:24 Lying in Wait- Liz Nugent
20:57 The Force -Don Winslow
24:50 A Stranger on the Beach- Michele Campbell
27:39 The Last Mrs. Parrish- Liv Constantine
29:56 The Hunting Wives- May Cobb
33:16 Velocity- Dean Koontz

Shelf Addition
39:10 One, Two Three- Laurie Frankel
41:32 The Jigsaw Man- Nadine Matheson

Other Books Mentioned
And Then There Were None- Agatha Christie
This Is How It Always Is- Laurie Frankel

*The book titles listed here are linked to Amazon Affiliate, there is no cost to you to purchase this way or even shop for other things but a small portion of your purchase will come back to us which will help with costs of the show.Â  Thank you for supporting us!

*Please consider Supporting the show (https://www.buymeacoffee.com/BTetc) which would help us with the costs of producing the podcast and continuing to bring you great content!

Connect with each of us for more book discussion, recs, and reviews. On Instagram, Tina is at @Tbretc and Renee is at Â @Itsbooktalk. You can also follow the podcast @Booktalketc!

You can also email us directly at booktalketc@gmail.com. Thanks for listening!Â
